description: To address CVE-2023-5479, update Microsoft Edge (Chromium-based) to version 118.0.2088.46, which incorporates the necessary changes from the Chromium project. Verify the version by opening the Edge browser, clicking on the three dots (...) for help, then selecting 'About Microsoft Edge' to check the build number. For additional details, refer to the Microsoft security update guide at [this link](https://msrc.microsoft.com/update-guide/vulnerability/CVE-2023-5479).
